text:
e="preserve">Richard Lee Bond (September 18, 1935 – July 23, 2020) was an American banker, lawyer and Republican politician. He was born in Kansas City, Kansas. He was a member of the Kansas State Senate from 1987 to 2000. He was president of the senate between 1996 and 2000.
Bond died on July 23, 2020 in Overland Park, Kansas at the age of 84.
